H0.text: Which Briton won the Nobel Prize for Literature in the 1980s. V.S. Naipaul

H1.text: Which Briton won the Nobel Prize for Literature in the 1980s. Iris Murdoch

H2.text: Which Briton won the Nobel Prize for Literature in the 1980s. Anthony Burgess

H3.text: Which Briton won the Nobel Prize for Literature in the 1980s. WILLIAM GOLDING

A4.text: Golding was awarded the 1983 Nobel Prize in Literature.
